abstract: Editorial charges alleged murder-for-hire plot against Saudi Arabia's ambassador to the United States is only the latest outrage from Tehran; urges US and its allies to use this moment to press hard for new round of diplomatic and economic sanctions; warns this Iranian regime must not be allowed to develop nuclear weapons.
snippet: An alleged murder-for-hire plot is only the latest outrage from Tehran and another reminder of why the U.S. and its allies must use diplomatic and economic sanctions.
lead_paragraph: An alleged murder-for-hire plot is only the latest outrage from Tehran and another reminder of why the U.S. and its allies must use diplomatic and economic sanctions.

headline.print_headline: The Charges Against Iran: An alleged murder-for-hire plot is only the latest outrage from Tehran
